thread.title: Packers' Jordan Love helps woman out of snow drift
thread.title_full: Packers' Jordan Love helps woman out of snow drift

author: Sam Schmitz
title: Packers' Jordan Love helps woman out of snow drift
text: Packers' Jordan Love helps woman out of snow drift Packers' Jordan Love helps woman out of snow drift BELOW. AS WE HEAD INTO NEXT WEEK. IMPORTANT TO PAY ATTENTION TO WEATHER RIGHT NOW. MARK. THANK YOU. WE’LL TAKE A LOOK AT THIS. A LUCKY PACKERS FAN GOT QUITE THE BIRTHDAY PRESENT. THIS IS LUCY AND HER BIRTHDAY WAS YESTERDAY. TODAY THOUGH, TAKE A LOOK AT THIS QUARTERBACK JORDAN LOVE HELPED HER OUT OF A SNOWDRIFT. THIS HAPPENED IN DE PERE, WISCONSIN EARLIER TODAY. LUCY OF COURSE IS HOME. SHE’S ON WINTER BREAK FROM UW MILWAUKEE, SO PERFECT TIMING. SHE EVEN GOT A CHANCE TO GET IN THAT SELFIE. NFC OFFENSIVE PLAYER OF THE WEEK Advertisement Packers' Jordan Love helps woman out of snow drift A lucky UW-Milwaukee student was surprised by Packers' quarterback Jordan Love the day after her birthday and received some help from him during a snowstorm.Lucy Kurowski was visiting her hometown of De Pere during her winter break. On Friday, Jan. 12, her aunt, Allie Adames, posted on X, the app formerly known as Twitter, that Love helped her out of a snow drift. This happened just days before the Packers face the Dallas Cowboys for a big playoff game on Sunday. The Packers will be flying out to Dallas on Saturday for their game against Dallas.
